question: Which Indian sportswoman has won Bronze at the 2018 World Wrestling Championships (WWC) in Budapest?
explanation: Pooja Dhanda has won Bronze in the women’s freestyle 57kg weight class  at the 2018 World Wrestling Championships (WWC) in Budapest, Hungary. She defeated Grace Bullen of Norway 10-7 in the bronze-medal playoff bout. This was India’s 2nd medal at the 2018 Championships, after Bajrang Punia won  silver  in 65 kg category in the ongoing event. With this, Dhanda  became only the fourth Indian woman grappler to win a medal at the World Championship. Before Pooja, only three Indian women grapplers (Alka Tomar, Geeta Phogat and Babita Phogat) had won a bronze medal each at the Worlds Championships.
